snippet: Quadrangle said in a letter to investors dated Feb. 1 that it had "amicably and conclusively resolved our disagreements" with Steven L. Rattner, who co-founded the firm in 2000.
abstract: Quadrangle said in a letter to investors dated Feb. 1 that it had "amicably and conclusively resolved our disagreements" with Steven L. Rattner, who co-founded the firm in 2000.

byline.original: By KEVIN ROOSE and PETER LATTMAN

headline.main: Quadrangle and Rattner Settle Arbitration Claims
